title: Signal
subtitle: "Recorded up to this point"
description: Autonomous decay of the Feedscatteron core. No external attack, no overload traces. She was actively shutting down.
synopsis:
July 2025. From orbit, 1549 watched 1547's signal decay - a curve that only fell, never rose, like a star slowly going dark. By the time 1548 arrived, there was no sound in the room.

All night.

Then August. Restart.
